name: quinfamide
content: Quinfamide is a drug that has anti-parasitic properties.   == Synthesis == Quinfamide is one of a relatively small family of antiamoebic compounds containing a dichloroacetamide function.  The synthesis begins by amidation of 6-hydroxytetrahydroquinoline with dichloroacetyl chloride. The sequence is completed by acylation with 2-furoyl chloride.   == References ==
